description: Pathology confirms endometrioid endometrial adenocarcinoma, FIGO grade 3, stage IA, with 36% myometrial invasion, lymphovascular space involvement, and endocervical mucosal extension; all lymph nodes are negative.
patient_notes: Your cancer was confined to the lining of the uterus and less than half of the muscle wall. The lymph nodes showed no cancer spread. Although this is a high-grade tumor, the surgery removed all visible disease. Additional treatment such as vaginal radiation may be considered to lower the risk of recurrence based on current guidelines.

verification.assessment: Staging is accurate as FIGO IA, pT1a pN0 M0; adjuvant treatment recommendation was omitted and should be vaginal brachytherapy per NCCN guidelines.

recommended_treatment.issues: Field is 'Not specified' but NCCN guidelines recommend adjuvant therapy for stage IA grade 3 endometrioid carcinoma

change_explanations.recommended_treatment: Changed from 'Not specified' to 'Vaginal brachytherapy'. Reason: Field is 'Not specified' but NCCN guidelines recommend adjuvant therapy for stage IA grade 3 endometrioid carcinoma
